DevOps.title: DevOps Engineer - Olive
DevOps.description: AlphaGrep is a proprietary trading firm focused on algorithmic trading in asset classes across the globe. We cover the global markets by leveraging and integrating technology, risk management and quantitative research.We are one of the largest firms by trading volume on Indian exchanges and have significant market share on several large global exchanges as well. We use a disciplined and systematic quantitative approach to identify factors that consistently generate alpha. These factors are then coupled with our proprietary ultra-low latency trading systems and robust risk management to develop trading strategies across asset classes (equities, commodities, currencies, fixed income) that trade on global exchanges.We are seeking bright and resourceful individuals for our DevOps team which is based out of our Mumbai office.Roles & ResponsibilitiesBuild infrastructure tools and applications to support trading teams across the firm.Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements.Coordinate with global teams to understand their requirements and work alongside them.Establishing programming patterns, documenting components and provide infrastructure for analysis and executionSet up practices on data reporting and continuous monitoringWrite a highly efficient and optimized code that is easily scalable.Adherence to coding and quality standards.Qualification1-4 years of strong hands-on experienceStrong working knowledge in programming languages like Python, C++, etc.Strong working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.Good to haveExperience with web crawling and scraping, text parsingExperience working in Linux EnvironmentExperience with Stock Market DataWhy You Should Join UsGreat People. Weâ€™re curious engineers, mathematicians, statisticians and like to have fun while achieving our goalsTransparent Structure. Our employees know that we value their ideas and contributionsRelaxed Environment. We have a flat organizational structure with frequent activities for all employees such as yearly offsites, happy hours, corporate sports teams, etc.Health & Wellness Programs. We believe that a balanced employee is more productive. A stocked kitchen, gym membership and generous vacation package are just some of the perks that we offer our employeesShow moreShow less

DevOps.title: Junior Systems Engineer
DevOps.description: Are you a passionate and drivenJunior System Engineerlooking to kickstart your career?EUROPEAN DYNAMICSis seeking a talented individual to join our team and play a crucial role in maintaining and optimizing our IT infrastructure. This is your chance to be part of a dynamic organization and advance your career in a collaborative and innovative environment.What You'll Do:Work with a team of engineers and be trained on the Systems management of a large IT Infrastructure supporting the company's global IT services, hosted services, and software development activities;Administration of Enterprise Server Virtualization platforms (including VMware and Hyper-V);Management and installation of Enterprise Grade server/storage hardware platforms;Administration of Enterprise Backup Systems;Collaborate with DevOps teams with respect to the delivery of new IT servicesRequirementsThe candidate should have a foundation in Linux or UNIX systems administration ideally within medium to large-scale IT environments;1-2 years of Linux or UNIX System Administration;Experience with enterprise storage and backup systems, mail systems, and Open Source technologies would be an advantage;University degree in IT or equivalent;Excellent command of English, both written and spokenBenefitsWe believe in rewarding talent and dedication. Here's what you can expect as part of our team:Competitive full-time salary;Private Health Coverage on the Company's group program;Flexible Working Hours;Top-of-the-Line Tools;Professional Development: Benefit from language courses, specialized training, and continuous learning opportunities;Career Growth: Work with some of the most innovative and exciting specialists in the industry;Dynamic Work Environment: Thrive in a setting that offers challenging goals, autonomy, and mentoring, fostering both personal and company growthIf you want an exciting challenge, work with some of the coolest technologies, and enjoy your time doing it, then join us! Submit your detailed CV in English, quoting reference: (JSYSENG/07/25).You may also consider all our other open vacancies by visiting the career section of our website (www.eurodyn.com) and follow us on Twitter (@EURODYN_Careers) and LinkedIn.EUROPEAN DYNAMICS (ED)(www.eurodyn.com) is a leading European Software, Information, and Communication Technologies company, operating internationally (Athens, Brussels, Luxembourg, Copenhagen, Berlin, Stockholm, London, Nicosia, Valetta, Vienna, Den Haag, Hong Kong, etc.) The company employs over 1100 engineers, IT experts, and consultants (around 3% PhD, 41% MSc, and 54% BSc). We design and develop software applications using integrated, state-of-the-art technology. Our current IT projects have a value exceeding 300 million EURO. EUROPEAN DYNAMICS is a renowned supplier of IT services to European Union Institutions, international organizations, European Agencies, and national government Administrations in 40 countries and 4 continents.As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce, we are committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race, colour, national origin, ethnicity, gender, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion.EUROPEAN DYNAMICS (ED)adheres to the General Data Protection Regulation principles by applying its Privacy Policy as published at www.eurodyn.com/privacy. By submitting an application to this position and by sharing your personal data with ED, you acknowledge and accept its Policy and authorize ED to process your personal data for the purposes of the company's recruitment opportunities, in line with the Policy.Show moreShow less

DevOps.title: DevOps Engineer - Olive
DevOps.description: AlphaGrep is a proprietary trading firm focused on algorithmic trading in asset classes across the globe. We cover the global markets by leveraging and integrating technology, risk management and quantitative research.We are one of the largest firms by trading volume on Indian exchanges and have significant market share on several large global exchanges as well. We use a disciplined and systematic quantitative approach to identify factors that consistently generate alpha. These factors are then coupled with our proprietary ultra-low latency trading systems and robust risk management to develop trading strategies across asset classes (equities, commodities, currencies, fixed income) that trade on global exchanges.We are seeking bright and resourceful individuals for our DevOps team which is based out of our Mumbai office.Roles & ResponsibilitiesBuild infrastructure tools and applications to support trading teams across the firm.Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements.Coordinate with global teams to understand their requirements and work alongside them.Establishing programming patterns, documenting components and provide infrastructure for analysis and executionSet up practices on data reporting and continuous monitoringWrite a highly efficient and optimized code that is easily scalable.Adherence to coding and quality standards.Qualification1-4 years of strong hands-on experienceStrong working knowledge in programming languages like Python, C++, etc.Strong working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.Good to haveExperience with web crawling and scraping, text parsingExperience working in Linux EnvironmentExperience with Stock Market DataWhy You Should Join UsGreat People. Weâ€™re curious engineers, mathematicians, statisticians and like to have fun while achieving our goalsTransparent Structure. Our employees know that we value their ideas and contributionsRelaxed Environment. We have a flat organizational structure with frequent activities for all employees such as yearly offsites, happy hours, corporate sports teams, etc.Health & Wellness Programs. We believe that a balanced employee is more productive. A stocked kitchen, gym membership and generous vacation package are just some of the perks that we offer our employeesShow moreShow less

DevOps.title: Junior Systems Engineer
DevOps.description: Are you a passionate and drivenJunior System Engineerlooking to kickstart your career?EUROPEAN DYNAMICSis seeking a talented individual to join our team and play a crucial role in maintaining and optimizing our IT infrastructure. This is your chance to be part of a dynamic organization and advance your career in a collaborative and innovative environment.What You'll Do:Work with a team of engineers and be trained on the Systems management of a large IT Infrastructure supporting the company's global IT services, hosted services, and software development activities;Administration of Enterprise Server Virtualization platforms (including VMware and Hyper-V);Management and installation of Enterprise Grade server/storage hardware platforms;Administration of Enterprise Backup Systems;Collaborate with DevOps teams with respect to the delivery of new IT servicesRequirementsThe candidate should have a foundation in Linux or UNIX systems administration ideally within medium to large-scale IT environments;1-2 years of Linux or UNIX System Administration;Experience with enterprise storage and backup systems, mail systems, and Open Source technologies would be an advantage;University degree in IT or equivalent;Excellent command of English, both written and spokenBenefitsWe believe in rewarding talent and dedication. Here's what you can expect as part of our team:Competitive full-time salary;Private Health Coverage on the Company's group program;Flexible Working Hours;Top-of-the-Line Tools;Professional Development: Benefit from language courses, specialized training, and continuous learning opportunities;Career Growth: Work with some of the most innovative and exciting specialists in the industry;Dynamic Work Environment: Thrive in a setting that offers challenging goals, autonomy, and mentoring, fostering both personal and company growthIf you want an exciting challenge, work with some of the coolest technologies, and enjoy your time doing it, then join us! Submit your detailed CV in English, quoting reference: (JSYSENG/07/25).You may also consider all our other open vacancies by visiting the career section of our website (www.eurodyn.com) and follow us on Twitter (@EURODYN_Careers) and LinkedIn.EUROPEAN DYNAMICS (ED)(www.eurodyn.com) is a leading European Software, Information, and Communication Technologies company, operating internationally (Athens, Brussels, Luxembourg, Copenhagen, Berlin, Stockholm, London, Nicosia, Valetta, Vienna, Den Haag, Hong Kong, etc.) The company employs over 1100 engineers, IT experts, and consultants (around 3% PhD, 41% MSc, and 54% BSc). We design and develop software applications using integrated, state-of-the-art technology. Our current IT projects have a value exceeding 300 million EURO. EUROPEAN DYNAMICS is a renowned supplier of IT services to European Union Institutions, international organizations, European Agencies, and national government Administrations in 40 countries and 4 continents.As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce, we are committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race, colour, national origin, ethnicity, gender, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion.EUROPEAN DYNAMICS (ED)adheres to the General Data Protection Regulation principles by applying its Privacy Policy as published at www.eurodyn.com/privacy. By submitting an application to this position and by sharing your personal data with ED, you acknowledge and accept its Policy and authorize ED to process your personal data for the purposes of the company's recruitment opportunities, in line with the Policy.Show moreShow less

Viva.com is the first to pioneer and holds the top position in the Tap on Any Device technology, enabling payments acceptance on any device or even without a device.Today Viva.com is leading the transition to All-in-One business solutions, powered by its full suite of financial services. To that end, reflecting its holistic approach to business needs, Viva.com has built a dynamic ecosystem featuring over 450 tech partner-innovators in the software and hardware space. Connecting directly to all local payment schemes, alternative payment methods and payment systems across the continent, further strengthens Viva.com's value proposition.Viva.com envisions to provide businesses a value-driven platform to accelerate the adoption of the latest technology.As Viva.com continues to expand as Europe's first Tech Bank for businesses, we're looking for aDevOps Engineerto join our fast-growing Technology Group.The RoleIn this role, you'll play a key part in driving critical infrastructure and automation projects, collaborating across architecture, project management, and engineering functions. DevOps.title: DevOps Engineer
DevOps.description: About The CompanyAlphaGrep is a quantitative trading firm focused on algorithmic trading in asset classes across the globe. We cover the global markets by leveraging and integrating technology, risk management and quantitative research.We are one of the largest firms by trading volume on Indian exchanges and have significant market share on several large global exchanges as well. We use a disciplined and systematic quantitative approach to identify factors that consistently generate alpha. These factors are then coupled with our proprietary ultra-low latency trading systems and robust risk management to develop trading strategies across asset classes (equities, commodities, currencies, fixed income) that trade on global exchanges.We are looking for a skilled DevOps Engineer with expertise in automating pipelines and improving operational processes. The ideal candidate will have strong coding abilities, experience with production-level systems, and a passion for building tools that streamline team workflows. You must have excellent communication skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently in a fast-paced environment.ResponsibilitiesAutomate pipelines based on provided specifications to enhance operational efficiencyWrite clean, scalable code to develop tools that are utilized across the teamImprove existing pipelines by identifying areas for optimization and implementing solutionsSet up alerts to proactively monitor system health and identify potential issues earlyManage operations and respond to alerts, ensuring smooth, uninterrupted workflow processesMonitor and manage alerts to ensure continuous performance and system reliabilityQualificationsProven experience working with production-level code, ensuring it is reliable and efficientAbility to write clean, scalable code that supports long-term maintainability and performanceProficiency in Python for scripting and automation tasksBash knowledge is helpful for task automation and script management at the system levelAbility to quickly understand complex tasks and translate them into practical, automated solutionsStrong code design skills for building robust and effective automation toolsExperience with C++ is a plus Additional Requirements:Excellent communication skills and experience working with both internal and external clientsHighly organized, with strong attention to detailAbility to work independently under pressureInterest in financial markets is a plus.This position is ideal for someone who thrives in automating processes, improving pipeline efficiency, and solving operational challenges. You'll be a key player in ensuring smooth workflows and system operations, making a significant impact across the team.Why You Should Join UsGreat People. Weâ€™re curious engineers, mathematicians, statisticians and like to have fun while achieving our goalsTransparent Structure. Our employees know that we value their ideas and contributionsRelaxed Environment. We have a flat organizational structure with frequent activities for all employees such as yearly offsites, happy hours, corporate sports teams, etc.Health & Wellness Programs. We believe that a balanced employee is more productive. A stocked kitchen, gym membership and generous vacation package are just some of the perks that we offer our employeesShow moreShow less

DevOps.title: Junior Systems Engineer
DevOps.description: Are you a passionate and drivenJunior System Engineerlooking to kickstart your career?EUROPEAN DYNAMICSis seeking a talented individual to join our team and play a crucial role in maintaining and optimizing our IT infrastructure. This is your chance to be part of a dynamic organization and advance your career in a collaborative and innovative environment.What You'll Do:Work with a team of engineers and be trained on the Systems management of a large IT Infrastructure supporting the company's global IT services, hosted services, and software development activities;Administration of Enterprise Server Virtualization platforms (including VMware and Hyper-V);Management and installation of Enterprise Grade server/storage hardware platforms;Administration of Enterprise Backup Systems;Collaborate with DevOps teams with respect to the delivery of new IT servicesRequirementsThe candidate should have a foundation in Linux or UNIX systems administration ideally within medium to large-scale IT environments;1-2 years of Linux or UNIX System Administration;Experience with enterprise storage and backup systems, mail systems, and Open Source technologies would be an advantage;University degree in IT or equivalent;Excellent command of English, both written and spokenBenefitsWe believe in rewarding talent and dedication. Here's what you can expect as part of our team:Competitive full-time salary;Private Health Coverage on the Company's group program;Flexible Working Hours;Top-of-the-Line Tools;Professional Development: Benefit from language courses, specialized training, and continuous learning opportunities;Career Growth: Work with some of the most innovative and exciting specialists in the industry;Dynamic Work Environment: Thrive in a setting that offers challenging goals, autonomy, and mentoring, fostering both personal and company growthIf you want an exciting challenge, work with some of the coolest technologies, and enjoy your time doing it, then join us! Submit your detailed CV in English, quoting reference: (JSYSENG/07/25).You may also consider all our other open vacancies by visiting the career section of our website (www.eurodyn.com) and follow us on Twitter (@EURODYN_Careers) and LinkedIn.EUROPEAN DYNAMICS (ED)(www.eurodyn.com) is a leading European Software, Information, and Communication Technologies company, operating internationally (Athens, Brussels, Luxembourg, Copenhagen, Berlin, Stockholm, London, Nicosia, Valetta, Vienna, Den Haag, Hong Kong, etc.) The company employs over 1100 engineers, IT experts, and consultants (around 3% PhD, 41% MSc, and 54% BSc). We design and develop software applications using integrated, state-of-the-art technology. Our current IT projects have a value exceeding 300 million EURO. EUROPEAN DYNAMICS is a renowned supplier of IT services to European Union Institutions, international organizations, European Agencies, and national government Administrations in 40 countries and 4 continents.As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce, we are committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race, colour, national origin, ethnicity, gender, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion.EUROPEAN DYNAMICS (ED)adheres to the General Data Protection Regulation principles by applying its Privacy Policy as published at www.eurodyn.com/privacy. By submitting an application to this position and by sharing your personal data with ED, you acknowledge and accept its Policy and authorize ED to process your personal data for the purposes of the company's recruitment opportunities, in line with the Policy.Show moreShow less

DevOps.title: DevOps Engineer
DevOps.description: Viva.com, the 1st Tech Bank in Europe for Businesses, revolutionises omnichannel payments acceptance, offers card issuing, loans and deposit accounts. Viva.com is the first to pioneer and holds the top position in the Tap on Any Device technology, enabling payments acceptance on any device or even without a device.Today Viva.com is leading the transition to All-in-One business solutions, powered by its full suite of financial services. To that end, reflecting its holistic approach to business needs, Viva.com has built a dynamic ecosystem featuring over 450 tech partner-innovators in the software and hardware space. Connecting directly to all local payment schemes, alternative payment methods and payment systems across the continent, further strengthens Viva.com's value proposition.Viva.com envisions to provide businesses a value-driven platform to accelerate the adoption of the latest technology.As Viva.com continues to expand as Europe's first Tech Bank for businesses, we're looking for aDevOps Engineerto join our fast-growing Technology Group.The RoleIn this role, you'll play a key part in driving critical infrastructure and automation projects, collaborating across architecture, project management, and engineering functions. You'll be expected to operate autonomously while actively contributing to a culture of technical excellence. With a strong focus on cloud infrastructure, automation, and AI-assisted operations, you'll help shape the backbone of our platform.Design, implement, and maintain our CI/CD pipelines and DevOps.title: DevOps Engineer - Olive
DevOps.description: AlphaGrep is a proprietary trading firm focused on algorithmic trading in asset classes across the globe. We cover the global markets by leveraging and integrating technology, risk management and quantitative research.We are one of the largest firms by trading volume on Indian exchanges and have significant market share on several large global exchanges as well. We use a disciplined and systematic quantitative approach to identify factors that consistently generate alpha. These factors are then coupled with our proprietary ultra-low latency trading systems and robust risk management to develop trading strategies across asset classes (equities, commodities, currencies, fixed income) that trade on global exchanges.We are seeking bright and resourceful individuals for our DevOps team which is based out of our Mumbai office.Roles & ResponsibilitiesBuild infrastructure tools and applications to support trading teams across the firm.Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements.Coordinate with global teams to understand their requirements and work alongside them.Establishing programming patterns, documenting components and provide infrastructure for analysis and executionSet up practices on data reporting and continuous monitoringWrite a highly efficient and optimized code that is easily scalable.Adherence to coding and quality standards.Qualification1-4 years of strong hands-on experienceStrong working knowledge in programming languages like Python, C++, etc.Strong working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.Good to haveExperience with web crawling and scraping, text parsingExperience working in Linux EnvironmentExperience with Stock Market DataWhy You Should Join UsGreat People. Weâ€™re curious engineers, mathematicians, statisticians and like to have fun while achieving our goalsTransparent Structure. Our employees know that we value their ideas and contributionsRelaxed Environment. We have a flat organizational structure with frequent activities for all employees such as yearly offsites, happy hours, corporate sports teams, etc.Health & Wellness Programs. We believe that a balanced employee is more productive. A stocked kitchen, gym membership and generous vacation package are just some of the perks that we offer our employeesShow moreShow less

DevOps.title: Junior Systems Engineer
DevOps.description: Are you a passionate and drivenJunior System Engineerlooking to kickstart your career?EUROPEAN DYNAMICSis seeking a talented individual to join our team and play a crucial role in maintaining and optimizing our IT infrastructure. This is your chance to be part of a dynamic organization and advance your career in a collaborative and innovative environment.What You'll Do:Work with a team of engineers and be trained on the Systems management of a large IT Infrastructure supporting the company's global IT services, hosted services, and software development activities;Administration of Enterprise Server Virtualization platforms (including VMware and Hyper-V);Management and installation of Enterprise Grade server/storage hardware platforms;Administration of Enterprise Backup Systems;Collaborate with DevOps teams with respect to the delivery of new IT servicesRequirementsThe candidate should have a foundation in Linux or UNIX systems administration ideally within medium to large-scale IT environments;1-2 years of Linux or UNIX System Administration;Experience with enterprise storage and backup systems, mail systems, and Open Source technologies would be an advantage;University degree in IT or equivalent;Excellent command of English, both written and spokenBenefitsWe believe in rewarding talent and dedication. Here's what you can expect as part of our team:Competitive full-time salary;Private Health Coverage on the Company's group program;Flexible Working Hours;Top-of-the-Line Tools;Professional Development: Benefit from language courses, specialized training, and continuous learning opportunities;Career Growth: Work with some of the most innovative and exciting specialists in the industry;Dynamic Work Environment: Thrive in a setting that offers challenging goals, autonomy, and mentoring, fostering both personal and company growthIf you want an exciting challenge, work with some of the coolest technologies, and enjoy your time doing it, then join us! Submit your detailed CV in English, quoting reference: (JSYSENG/07/25).You may also consider all our other open vacancies by visiting the career section of our website (www.eurodyn.com) and follow us on Twitter (@EURODYN_Careers) and LinkedIn.EUROPEAN DYNAMICS (ED)(www.eurodyn.com) is a leading European Software, Information, and Communication Technologies company, operating internationally (Athens, Brussels, Luxembourg, Copenhagen, Berlin, Stockholm, London, Nicosia, Valetta, Vienna, Den Haag, Hong Kong, etc.) The company employs over 1100 engineers, IT experts, and consultants (around 3% PhD, 41% MSc, and 54% BSc). We design and develop software applications using integrated, state-of-the-art technology. Our current IT projects have a value exceeding 300 million EURO. EUROPEAN DYNAMICS is a renowned supplier of IT services to European Union Institutions, international organizations, European Agencies, and national government Administrations in 40 countries and 4 continents.As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce, we are committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race, colour, national origin, ethnicity, gender, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion.EUROPEAN DYNAMICS (ED)adheres to the General Data Protection Regulation principles by applying its Privacy Policy as published at www.eurodyn.com/privacy. DevOps.title: Python / AI Engineer
DevOps.description: For this position we are only looking forcandidates located in Greece.Nairon GmbH is a Swiss startup focused on building practical solutions in web development and artificial intelligence. Our current work includes a large-scale web application and an AI-driven customer support system. We value clear communication, thoughtful engineering, and a collaborative approach to problem-solving. Join us as we continue to develop tools that make a differenceTasksAs a Python/AI Engineer at Nairon GmbH, your work will focus primarily on backend development and AI integration, with occasional collaboration across the full stack.Your responsibilities will include:Designing, building, and maintaining backend services usingPythonandFastAPI.Developing and integrating LLM-based systems using tools such asLangChain or Pipecatand other relevant APIsCreating modular, reusable backend components to power voice and chat-based AI interfaces.Writing clean, well-structured code and contributing to code reviews and architectural decisions.Collaborating with frontend developers, UX designers, and project leads to align technical implementation with product goals.Applying DevOps best practices usingDockerand, where appropriate,Kubernetesfor deployment and scalability.Supporting communication and coordination within the Athens-based development team.RequirementsExperience:Any relevant backend or AI engineering experience is welcome. DevOps.description: GRNET S.A. provides Internet connectivity, high-quality e-Infrastructures and advanced services to the Greek Educational, Academic and Research community, aiming at minimising the digital divide and at ensuring equal participation of its members in the global Society of Knowledge. GRNET provides advanced services to the following sectors: Education, Research, Health, Culture.We are currently looking for a passionate DevOps Engineer to work on designing, implementing and providing advanced operational support for service, server, virtualization and computing/storage service solutions.As a DevOps Engineer at GRNET S.A., you will be responsible for monitoring the implementation details of an cloud-enabled application ecosystem under construction (AWS environment). You will work closely with the project contractor to ensure smooth implementation, write technical reports, and effectively communicate issues that need improvement. Additionally, you will operate and maintain the ecosystem independently once the project contractor has completed their work and stepped away.Role Overview:As a DevOps Engineer at GRNET S.A., you will be responsible for monitoring the implementation details of an cloud-enabled application ecosystem under construction (AWS environment). You will work closely with the project contractor to ensure smooth implementation, write technical reports, and effectively communicate issues that need improvement. Additionally, you will operate and maintain the ecosystem independently once the project contractor has completed their work and stepped away.RequirementsResponsibilities:Implementation Monitoring:Monitor the implementation of application ecosystems on cloud-enabled environments, ensuring adherence to technical specifications and best practices.Technical Reporting: Write comprehensive technical reports detailing implementation progress, issues encountered, and resolutions implemented. These reports will serve as documentation for internal reference and future troubleshooting.Communication and Delegation: Maintain regular communication with the project contractor, providing updates on implementation progress and highlighting areas requiring attention or improvement. Delegate tasks effectively to ensure timely resolution of issues.Operational Maintenance: Once the implementation phase is complete, take ownership of operating and maintaining the application ecosystem. Ensure continuous uptime, performance optimization, and security enhancement.Documentation: Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation for the application ecosystem, including configurations, procedures, and troubleshooting guides. This documentation will facilitate knowledge transfer and support future enhancements or migrations.Requirements:Install, configure, test and maintain operating systems, application software and system management toolsImplementation of deployments, migrations, maintenanceDeploy updates and fixesMaintain security, backup, and redundancy strategiesStrong understanding of cloud computing principlesFamiliarity with containerization technologies like Docker and container orchestration platforms like KubernetesExperience with monitoring and logging toolsExcellent communication skills with the ability to convey technical concepts effectively to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.Proven ability to work independently and collaboratively in a dynamic team environmentYour (docker) and docker-composeFeeling comfortable with container orchestration using Kubernetes and associated tools like Helm, Kompose, etcFeeling comfortable with proper setup of networking, load problem solving skillsWorking with agile methodologiesExperience designing and implementing continuous delivery and/or DevOps solutions or architecture patternsExperience in proper setup of networking, load balancing, etc to support high-throughput applicationsExperience with test automation and test-driven developmentPrior experience with DevOps practices, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and infrastructure as code (IaC) is a plusPersonal Characteristics:Creativity, innovation spirit and team playerDynamic personality, ability to accept challenges and undertake responsibilitiesEnthusiasm, persistence and willingness to deliver results on timeBenefitsBenefitsWhat we offer:Opportunity for continuous professional growth and System Administrator.title: Network Engineer
System Administrator.description: Sportserve forms part of a remarkable group of B2C sports betting and B2B sportsbook technology companies, focused on delivering first class sports betting experiences and casino products for our users worldwide. Along with Sportion, TechSpirit, Standard Focus and Sportelligent, we are the driving force behind the world renowned sports betting company and our flagship brand, Dafabet.Since launching our global hiring initiative, we now employ over 2,000 people worldwide, offering exciting career paths in Technology, Trading, Operations and Media. We pride ourselves on having a diverse and international culture that embraces the global community and acts locally. We offer office based, hybrid and remote work on permanent and consultancy contracts all over the world, making us the true global employer of choice.We are looking to hire a talented Engineer to join our global team in Technology. This is a challenging, fast-paced and exciting environment, with plenty of opportunities to grow. As part of the Network Engineering team, you will improve the stability, resilience and scale of our services by automation, testing and engineering. To consistently deliver value to the customers, you will ensure that:Technical solutions are aligned across teams andMonitoring, logging and alerting facilities are in place.List of skills we think you'll need:Effective communication skills.Problem solving.Defining and maintaining processes.Adaptability to shifting directions, circumstances and priorities.Proficiency in agile practices.Technical skills:Deep knowledge of general routing, load balancing and switching.Good understanding of network protocols, including TCP/IP, BGP, OSPF, VLANs, and other protocols commonly used in enterprise networks.Ability to troubleshoot complex network issues like network performance degradation.Experience with firewalls, VPNs, intrusion detection and prevention systems, and other security measures.Experience with operations culture and good understanding of metrics, alarms and dashboards.Experience in network automation tools and techniques, including scripting or programming languages like Python.Experience with network maintenance procedures including upgrades, configuration changes and software/firmware updates.Experience using one of the major cloud providers.Mindset:Take ownership and pride in the work you deliver.Maintain comprehensive documentation of network procedures, configurations and changes.Participate in on-call rotation.Work effectively both as part of a team and independently.Adhere to team processes and ways of working.Reduce toil with automation.Foster a culture of open exchange of ideas, innovation and continuous improvement.Share knowledge with colleagues.Understand the importance of and be a strong advocate for non-functionals, such as monitoring, alerting and logging.We warmly invite applications in English.Diversity & Inclusion at SportserveAt Sportserve, we are deeply committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace. We believe in building a team that reflects a wide array of backgrounds, skills, and perspectives. Embracing diversity not only enriches our work culture but also drives innovation and excellence. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer, where everyoneâ€™s contribution is valued and respected.If youâ€™re a passionate about technology and looking to start your career in an international, forward-thinking Sports Betting company, weâ€™d love to hear from you. Apply now to become part of our exciting journey.Show moreShow less
